Module HW05
Package model.strategy

Class SwitcherStrategy<TMsg>

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.strategy.SwitcherStrategy<TMsg>
  • Type Parameters:
    TMsg - The type of message that the supplied IDispatcher can send.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUpdateStrategy<TMsg>
    public class SwitcherStrategy<TMsg>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUpdateStrategy<TMsg>
    This class is a wrapper over a single arbitrary strategy which can be changed.
    Author:
    Peter Dulworth (psd2)
